mn122:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
mn122:2.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya kapilavatthum pindaya pavisi.
mn122:2.2: Kapilavatthusmim pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena kalakhemakassa sakkassa viharo tenupasankami divaviharaya.
mn122:2.3: Tena kho pana samayena kalakhemakassa sakkassa vihare sambahulani senasanani pannattani honti.
mn122:2.4: Addasa kho bhagava kalakhemakassa sakkassa vihare sambahulani senasanani pannattani.
mn122:2.6: “sambahulani kho kalakhemakassa sakkassa vihare senasanani pannattani.
mn122:2.7: Sambahula nu kho idha bhikkhu viharanti”ti.
mn122:2.8: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma anando sambahulehi bhikkhuhi saddhim ghataya sakkassa vihare civarakammam karoti.
mn122:2.9: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena ghataya sakkassa viharo tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
mn122:2.10: Nisajja kho bhagava ayasmantam anandam amantesi:
mn122:2.11: “sambahulani kho, ananda, kalakhemakassa sakkassa vihare senasanani pannattani.
mn122:2.12: Sambahula nu kho ettha bhikkhu viharanti”ti?
mn122:2.13: “Sambahulani, bhante, kalakhemakassa sakkassa vihare senasanani pannattani.
mn122:3.1: “Na kho, ananda, bhikkhu sobhati sanganikaramo sanganikarato sanganikaramatam anuyutto ganaramo ganarato ganasammudito.
mn122:3.2: So vatananda, bhikkhu sanganikaramo sanganikarato sanganikaramatam anuyutto ganaramo ganarato ganasammudito yam tam nekkhammasukham pavivekasukham upasamasukham sambodhisukham tassa sukhassa nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn122:3.3: Yo ca kho so, ananda, bhikkhu eko ganasma vupakattho viharati tassetam bhikkhuno patikankham yam tam nekkhammasukham pavivekasukham upasamasukham sambodhisukham tassa sukhassa nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn122:4.1: So vatananda, bhikkhu sanganikaramo sanganikarato sanganikaramatam anuyutto ganaramo ganarato ganasammudito samayikam va kantam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharissati asamayikam va akuppanti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn122:4.2: Yo ca kho so, ananda, bhikkhu eko ganasma vupakattho viharati tassetam bhikkhuno patikankham samayikam va kantam cetovimuttim upasampajja viharissati asamayikam va akuppanti—thanametam vijjati.
mn122:5.1: Naham, ananda, ekam rupampi samanupassami yattha rattassa yathabhiratassa rupassa viparinamannathabhava na uppajjeyyum sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa.
mn122:6.1: Ayam kho panananda, viharo tathagatena abhisambuddho yadidam—
mn122:6.2: sabbanimittanam amanasikara ajjhattam sunnatam upasampajja viharitum.
mn122:6.3: Tatra ce, ananda, tathagatam imina viharena viharantam bhavanti upasankamitaro bhikkhu bhikkhuniyo upasaka upasikayo rajano rajamahamatta titthiya titthiyasavaka.
mn122:6.4: Tatrananda, tathagato vivekaninneneva cittena vivekaponena vivekapabbharena vupakatthena nekkhammabhiratena byantibhutena sabbaso asavatthaniyehi dhammehi annadatthu uyyojanikapatisamyuttamyeva katham katta hoti.
mn122:7.2: ‘ajjhattam sunnatam upasampajja vihareyyan’ti, tenananda, bhikkhuna ajjhattameva cittam santhapetabbam sannisadetabbam ekodi katabbam samadahatabbam.
mn122:7.3: Kathancananda, bhikkhu ajjhattameva cittam santhapeti sannisadeti ekodim karoti samadahati?
mn122:8.1: Idhananda, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi …pe… pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati …pe…
mn122:8.5: Evam kho, ananda, bhikkhu ajjhattameva cittam santhapeti sannisadeti ekodim karoti samadahati.
mn122:9.2: Tassa ajjhattam sunnatam manasikaroto sunnataya cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati.
mn122:9.3: Evam santametam, ananda, bhikkhu evam pajanati:
mn122:9.4: ‘ajjhattam sunnatam kho me manasikaroto ajjhattam sunnataya cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati’ti.
mn122:9.9: Tassa anenjam manasikaroto anenjaya cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati.
mn122:9.10: Evam santametam, ananda, bhikkhu evam pajanati:
mn122:9.11: ‘anenjam kho me manasikaroto anenjaya cittam na pakkhandati nappasidati na santitthati na vimuccati’ti.
mn122:10.1: Tenananda, bhikkhuna tasmimyeva purimasmim samadhinimitte ajjhattameva cittam santhapetabbam sannisadetabbam ekodi katabbam samadahatabbam.
mn122:10.3: Tassa ajjhattam sunnatam manasikaroto ajjhattam sunnataya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati.
mn122:10.4: Evam santametam, ananda, bhikkhu evam pajanati:
mn122:10.5: ‘ajjhattam sunnatam kho me manasikaroto ajjhattam sunnataya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati’ti.
mn122:10.10: Tassa anenjam manasikaroto anenjaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati.
mn122:10.11: Evam santametam, ananda, bhikkhu evam pajanati:
mn122:10.12: ‘anenjam kho me manasikaroto anenjaya cittam pakkhandati pasidati santitthati vimuccati’ti.
mn122:11.1: Tassa ce, ananda, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato cankamaya cittam namati, so cankamati:
mn122:11.2: ‘evam mam cankamantam nabhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassavissanti’ti.
mn122:11.4: Tassa ce, ananda, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato thanaya cittam namati, so titthati:
mn122:11.5: ‘evam mam thitam nabhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassavissanti’ti.
mn122:11.7: Tassa ce, ananda, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato nisajjaya cittam namati, so nisidati:
mn122:11.8: ‘evam mam nisinnam nabhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassavissanti’ti.
mn122:11.10: Tassa ce, ananda, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato sayanaya cittam namati, so sayati:
mn122:11.11: ‘evam mam sayantam nabhijjhadomanassa papaka akusala dhamma anvassavissanti’ti.
mn122:12.1: Tassa ce, ananda, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato kathaya cittam namati, so:
mn122:12.2: ‘yayam katha hina gamma pothujjanika anariya anatthasamhita na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattati, seyyathidam—rajakatha corakatha mahamattakatha senakatha bhayakatha yuddhakatha annakatha panakatha vatthakatha sayanakatha malakatha gandhakatha natikatha yanakatha gamakatha nigamakatha nagarakatha janapadakatha itthikatha surakatha visikhakatha kumbhatthanakatha pubbapetakatha nanattakatha lokakkhayika samuddakkhayika itibhavabhavakatha iti va iti—evarupim katham na kathessami’ti.
mn122:12.4: Ya ca kho ayam, ananda, katha abhisallekhika cetovinivaranasappaya ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati, seyyathidam—appicchakatha santutthikatha pavivekakatha asamsaggakatha viriyarambhakatha silakatha samadhikatha pannakatha vimuttikatha vimuttinanadassanakatha iti: ‘evarupim katham kathessami’ti.
mn122:13.1: Tassa ce, ananda, bhikkhuno imina viharena viharato vitakkaya cittam namati, so:
mn122:13.2: ‘ye te vitakka hina gamma pothujjanika anariya anatthasamhita na nibbidaya na viragaya na nirodhaya na upasamaya na abhinnaya na sambodhaya na nibbanaya samvattanti, seyyathidam—kamavitakko byapadavitakko vihimsavitakko iti evarupe vitakke na vitakkessami’ti.
mn122:13.4: Ye ca kho ime, ananda, vitakka ariya niyyanika niyyanti takkarassa sammadukkhakkhayaya, seyyathidam—nekkhammavitakko abyapadavitakko avihimsavitakko iti: ‘evarupe vitakke vitakkessami’ti.
mn122:14.3: Cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya,
mn122:14.7: kayavinneyya photthabba ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya—
mn122:15.1: Yattha bhikkhuna abhikkhanam sakam cittam paccavekkhitabbam:
mn122:15.2: ‘atthi nu kho me imesu pancasu kamagunesu annatarasmim va annatarasmim va ayatane uppajjati cetaso samudacaro’ti?
mn122:15.3: Sace, ananda, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano evam pajanati:
mn122:15.4: ‘atthi kho me imesu pancasu kamagunesu annatarasmim va annatarasmim va ayatane uppajjati cetaso samudacaro’ti,
mn122:15.5: evam santametam, ananda, bhikkhu evam pajanati:
mn122:15.6: ‘yo kho imesu pancasu kamagunesu chandarago so me nappahino’ti.
mn122:15.8: Sace panananda, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano evam pajanati:
mn122:15.9: ‘natthi kho me imesu pancasu kamagunesu annatarasmim va annatarasmim va ayatane uppajjati cetaso samudacaro’ti,
mn122:15.10: evam santametam, ananda, bhikkhu evam pajanati:
mn122:15.11: ‘yo kho imesu pancasu kamagunesu chandarago so me pahino’ti.
mn122:16.1: Panca kho ime, ananda, upadanakkhandha yattha bhikkhuna udayabbayanupassina vihatabbam:
mn122:16.2: ‘iti rupam iti rupassa samudayo iti rupassa atthangamo,
mn122:16.6: iti vinnanam iti vinnanassa samudayo iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti.
mn122:17.1: Tassa imesu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassino viharato yo pancasu upadanakkhandhesu asmimano so pahiyati.
mn122:17.2: Evam santametam, ananda, bhikkhu evam pajanati:
mn122:17.3: ‘yo kho imesu pancasu upadanakkhandhesu asmimano so me pahino’ti.
mn122:18.1: Ime kho te, ananda, dhamma ekantakusala kusalayatika ariya lokuttara anavakkanta papimata.
mn122:19.2: kam atthavasam sampassamano arahati savako sattharam anubandhitum api panujjamano”ti?
mn122:19.3: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
mn122:20.1: “Na kho, ananda, arahati savako sattharam anubandhitum, yadidam suttam geyyam veyyakaranam tassa hetu.
mn122:20.3: Digharattassa hi te, ananda, dhamma suta dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
mn122:20.4: Ya ca kho ayam, ananda, katha abhisallekhika cetovinivaranasappaya ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattati, seyyathidam—appicchakatha santutthikatha pavivekakatha asamsaggakatha viriyarambhakatha silakatha samadhikatha pannakatha vimuttikatha vimuttinanadassanakatha—evarupiya kho, ananda, kathaya hetu arahati savako sattharam anubandhitum api panujjamano.
mn122:21.1: Evam sante kho, ananda, acariyupaddavo hoti, evam sante antevasupaddavo hoti, evam sante brahmacarupaddavo hoti.
mn122:22.2: Idhananda, ekacco sattha vivittam senasanam bhajati arannam rukkhamulam pabbatam kandaram giriguham susanam vanapattham abbhokasam palalapunjam.
mn122:22.3: Tassa tathavupakatthassa viharato anvavattanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
mn122:22.4: So anvavattantesu brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca muccham nikamayati, gedham apajjati, avattati bahullaya.
mn122:22.6: Acariyupaddavena avadhimsu nam papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
mn122:23.2: Tasseva kho panananda, satthu savako tassa satthu vivekamanubruhayamano
mn122:23.3: vivittam senasanam bhajati arannam rukkhamulam pabbatam kandaram giriguham susanam vanapattham abbhokasam palalapunjam.
mn122:23.4: Tassa tathavupakatthassa viharato anvavattanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
mn122:23.5: So anvavattantesu brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca muccham nikamayati, gedham apajjati, avattati bahullaya.
mn122:23.7: Antevasupaddavena avadhimsu nam papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
mn122:24.2: Idhananda, tathagato loke uppajjati araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava.
mn122:24.3: So vivittam senasanam bhajati arannam rukkhamulam pabbatam kandaram giriguham susanam vanapattham abbhokasam palalapunjam.
mn122:24.4: Tassa tathavupakatthassa viharato anvavattanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
mn122:24.5: So anvavattantesu brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca na muccham nikamayati, na gedham apajjati, na avattati bahullaya.
mn122:24.6: Tasseva kho panananda, satthu savako tassa satthu vivekamanubruhayamano
mn122:24.7: vivittam senasanam bhajati arannam rukkhamulam pabbatam kandaram giriguham susanam vanapattham abbhokasam palalapunjam.
mn122:24.8: Tassa tathavupakatthassa viharato anvavattanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
mn122:24.9: So anvavattantesu brahmanagahapatikesu negamesu ceva janapadesu ca muccham nikamayati, gedham apajjati, avattati bahullaya.
mn122:24.11: Brahmacarupaddavena avadhimsu nam papaka akusala dhamma sankilesika ponobbhavika sadara dukkhavipaka ayatim jatijaramaraniya.
mn122:24.13: Tatrananda, yo cevayam acariyupaddavo, yo ca antevasupaddavo ayam tehi brahmacarupaddavo dukkhavipakataro ceva katukavipakataro ca, api ca vinipataya samvattati.
mn122:25.1: Tasmatiha mam, ananda, mittavataya samudacaratha, ma sapattavataya.
mn122:25.2: Tam vo bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn122:25.3: Kathancananda, sattharam savaka sapattavataya samudacaranti, no mittavataya?
mn122:25.4: Idhananda, sattha savakanam dhammam deseti anukampako hitesi anukampam upadaya:
mn122:25.6: Tassa savaka na sussusanti, na sotam odahanti, na anna cittam upatthapenti, vokkamma ca satthusasana vattanti.
mn122:25.7: Evam kho, ananda, sattharam savaka sapattavataya samudacaranti, no mittavataya.
mn122:26.1: Kathancananda, sattharam savaka mittavataya samudacaranti, no sapattavataya?
mn122:26.2: Idhananda, sattha savakanam dhammam deseti anukampako hitesi anukampam upadaya:
mn122:26.4: Tassa savaka sussusanti, sotam odahanti, anna cittam upatthapenti, na ca vokkamma satthusasana vattanti.
mn122:26.5: Evam kho, ananda, sattharam savaka mittavataya samudacaranti, no sapattavataya.
mn122:26.6: Tasmatiha mam, ananda, mittavataya samudacaratha, ma sapattavataya.
mn122:26.7: Tam vo bhavissati digharattam hitaya sukhaya.
mn122:27.1: Na vo aham, ananda, tatha parakkamissami yatha kumbhakaro amake amakamatte.
mn122:27.6: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
